CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03B02

TITLE.P: Medical consumables — Endoscopy — Helse Stavanger HF

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Contracting Authority would like tenders for machine independent consumables for endoscopy. The procurement is divided into 43 lots/subcontracts. For further specifications and estimated volume, see Part 2 Annex 1 Price Form. The combined estimated contract value for one year is 6 500 000 NOK — 7 500 000 NOK. Attention is drawn to the fact that the estimated values and volumes are not binding for the Contracting Authority.
See Part 2 Annex 2 — Specifications for further detailed information.
Tenderers complete the ESPD (European Self-Declaration Form) in Mercell, as stated in the tender provisions Point 4.1.

The total estimated volume for the lot is 36 items/year. See Part 2, Annex 1 - Price form for a more detailed description of product varieties/sizes (column B). The framework agreement has a duration of 24 months, with the possibility to extend for one year + one year.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: The framework agreement will be valid for 24 months (2 years), with an option to extend the framework agreement for 12 months (1 year) + 12 months (1 year).

SUITABILITY.P: A. The tenderer must be a legally established company. The tenderer can document this by submitting a copy of their Company Registration Certificate. Foreign companies shall submit proof that the company is registered in a trade or business register as prescribed by the law of the country where the tenderer is established.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: A contract will be signed with one tenderer per lot, for lot numbers 16 — 18 and for 21 — 43.
Parallel Framework Agreements will be entered into for lot numbers 1 — 15, and for 19 — 20.
See the competition provisions for further information.

INFO_ADD.P: The tender, including the completed annexes shall be in Norwegian or another Scandinavian language. Any enclosed studies and brochures can be in Norwegian, a Scandinavian language or English.
1. A contract will be signed with 1 tenderer per lot, for lot numbers 16 — 18 and for 21 — 43.
2. Parallel Framework Agreements will be entered into for lot numbers 1 — 15, and for 19 — 20.
See the competition provisions for further information.
